Html:
I know you can populate the column header like 

dataGrid1.Columns[0].Header =

"test1";

Is there an equivilant for the ROW HEADER?

Thanks

Yes, DataGridRow also has a Header property.  DataGridRow is a visual generated by the ItemsControl so you will have to access it either programmatically by searching the visual tree like the GetRow() method or through a style set on DataGridRow.

Vincent
